topic.title: Why sadness exist?
topic.body: I am sad, i can say it in just in this place with my bad english. My girlfriend is angry with me because i call her with a ex girlfriend name but i wrong because it's similar. I am not interested at my old love story. It's just a grammatical error. So i smoke while sit in my cheir in balcony. I write here because it's a secure place, because i can say everything at people that i don't know (unknow? Correct me please)
